name: df-lmat
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(clmat, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, cfv(cv(s0), nat0))), cfv(cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1)))))
comment: Define a function converting words of words into matrices. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Aug-2020.)
